## RenderedConnection.moveToOffset() method

Move this connection to the location given by its offset within the block and the location of the block's top left corner.

**Signature:**

```typescript
moveToOffset(blockTL: Coordinate): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  blockTL | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | The location of the top left corner of the block, in workspace coordinates. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the position of the connection in the connection db was updated.
